{{Lang|'''Qingxin'''|zh=清心|zh_rm=Qīngxīn|zh_tl=Pure Heart}} are a [[Local Specialty]] found in the wild all over [[Liyue]].

==How to Obtain==
Qingxin grow on the mountaintops and peaks throughout Liyue; many can notably be found in [[Minlin]] and [[Wuwang Hill]].

See the gallery or the '''[https://webstatic-sea.mihoyo.com/app/ys-map-sea/index.html#/map/2?shown_types=32 Teyvat Interactive Map]''' for specific locations.

Additionally, the following NPCs give Qingxin after following a certain dialogue branch for the first time:
* [[Qinglian (Stone Gate)|Qinglian]] at [[Stone Gate]], [[Liyue]] (3× Qingxin)

==Trivia==
* {{Mail Attachments by Category List}}
* Qingxin is [[Ganyu]]'s favorite food.
** According to her, Qingxin tastes bitter.
* According to [[Xiangling/Lore#Character Story 3|Xiangling's third Character Story]], the combination of Mint and Qingxin Flowers may induce diarrhea. [[Chef Mao|Her father]] experienced this the hard way, though Xiangling herself was unaffected.
